result.execSummary:
All charges against Willie B Scott in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Willie B Scott is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Willie B Scott

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Steven Rees Wiechmann in court, defendant Willie B Scott not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  For reasons stated on the record  and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant Willie B Scott not in court, defendant in custody.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The Public Defender's office was unable to interview the defendant.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 4.  Status conference scheduled for July 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Order to Produce from Oshkosh Correctional, Filed.

Defendant Willie B Scott in court, in custody.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered the warrant canceled.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 4.  Court retained file.  Status conference scheduled for July 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) ad
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Apple Store, Sunglass Hut and Mayfair Mall

Defendant Willie B Scott in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Willie B Scott in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Willie B Scott not in court.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued.  Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from the Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.  Court makes finding that there is a possible victim identified, therefore, Court stays order of forfeiture with recompense to be determined at close of case.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 06-05-2015 at 01:30pm
